title: 1. The real estate sponsor creates a RealPool™.
content: The Sponsor is a principal Developer or Investory. A project is proposed or ignited. All important details are furnished...(ie. location, risk profile, property type..eetc. The developer is asked to stake a small amount as his stake.The investment pool period begins as well as staking

title: 2. Crypto investors join the realpool
content: The investors pool funds in the form of DAI stablecoin. In return, the investor reecieves REALP token as a reward. in additioon, they are given an NFT token that symbolizes their investment in the pool. In the future, they will recieve staking rewards in terms of COMP and BAL when the investment period ends

title: 3. Staking and decison periods
content: Staking period ends after 30 days and decision period for sponsor begins(30-45-90 days). During this time, the rewards accumulate on the DAI stake—In most cases, the sponsor will look for loans or assess viability of project

title: 4. Options for partnerhip offered or declined
content: Period ends and offer extented to lp investors. if developer fails to extend offeer..he forfiets his stake in the pool as well as rewards.

title: 5. Pool Reward and Tally
content: The rewards fromm the DAI stake in the RealPool™ are paid out to investors. These rewards will vary based on yield farming risk profile..yet will definitely return positive returns.

title: 6. Options Tradeble and stakable
content: Options tradeable- now as investment option matures. Non-Fungible tokens are tradeable and transferable on many exchanges and wallets. They have the potential to increase in value as they represent something unique. In addition, we all users to stake them for RPY tokens. RPY will exist in scarce supply as governance tokens
